news.news:
Lupin now supports Time Spaced Repetition based on SM2 algorithm, import your flashcards directly from your github by running /tsr import ... you can then go over your pending flashcards using /tsr x where x is the number of cards you'd like to see. If you don't specify x the value set in your config.ini will be used.
 Also Lupin can now pull these news updates afte each update. This will keep you posted about the latest news.
